tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor listens to the problem, and discussed various next course of actions. He doesn't really prescribe tooth filling etc immediately but first tries to arrest the problem with meds, if it still persists then only asks for tooth filling. He doesn't charge to just see the patient or tooth problem. Charges only when we get the filling done.
